description:
Vessel of the American Navy. The captain is http://anidb.net/ch69737 [Meville] and the second in command is Holland. The ship and its crew are on the hunt for a supposed sea monster responsible for sinking ships in the Pacific Ocean. In episode 3, http://anidb.net/ch7216 [Nadia] and http://anidb.net/ch15976 [Jean] are rescued by the ship`s crew when they crash in the ocean while flying.
The ship is destroyed by a "sea monster" in episode 3. Later in the series, the ship`s remaining crew, including Meville, become antagonists to the cast when http://anidb.net/ch54793 [Gargoyle] tells the American Navy that the http://anidb.net/ch54795 [Nautilus] is responsible for sinking the ships.
â€” written by drr
name: Abraham
